term.title: Mössbauer thickness

item.text: The effective thickness of a source (t s) or absorber(t a) in the optical path.

sources.item: PAC, 1976, 45, 211. 'Nomenclature and Conventions for Reporting Mössbauer Spectroscopic Data' on page 214 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197645030211)
